flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I'm a big fan of the singing bust scene at Disneyland/word's Haunted Mansion so I decided to create it on my porch for trick-or-treaters. This project uses a motion sensor, Arduino, projector and some styrofoam heads to reproduce the effect on the cheap!
guide.introduction_rendered: I'm a big fan of the singing bust scene at Disneyland/word's Haunted Mansion so I decided to create it on my porch for trick-or-treaters. This project uses a motion sensor, Arduino, projector and some styrofoam heads to reproduce the effect on the cheap!
guide.summary: A cheap way to reproduce the Disneyland/Disneyworld singing busts effect from the Haunted Mansion ride using an Arduino.
guide.title: Arduino powered Haunted Mansion Singing Busts
